name: remcode-sessions

scripts.summary: node -e "const s = require('./sessions.json'); console.log('ðŸ“Š Sessions:', s.metadata.totalSessions, '| Strategies:', Object.keys(require('./strategies.json').strategies).length)"
scripts.status: node -e "const s = require('./sessions.json'); const byStatus = s.sessions.reduce((acc, session) => { acc[session.status] = (acc[session.status] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}); console.log('ðŸ“ˆ Status Distribution:', byStatus)"
scripts.strategy-status: node -e "const s = require('./sessions.json'); const byStrategy = s.sessions.reduce((acc, session) => { acc[session.strategy] = (acc[session.strategy] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}); console.log('ðŸŽ¯ Strategy Distribution:', byStrategy)"
